mapper.select: SELECT it.item_idx, im.img_name, it.item_title FROM item it LEFT OUTER JOIN img im ON it.item_idx = im.item_idx, recentView rv WHERE 1=1 AND rv.member_id = #{sId} AND rv.item_idx = it.item_idx AND im.item_idx = it.item_idx AND im.img_idx = '1' AND it.item_quantity > 0 ORDER BY rv.viewTime DESC LIMIT 0,3
SELECT * FROM member WHERE member_id = #{sId}
SELECT c.coin_total FROM coin c WHERE member_id = #{sId} ORDER BY coin_idx DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment VALUES ( 1+(SELECT COUNT(p.payment_idx) FROM payment p WHERE member_id = #{sId}), #{sId}, (SELECT m.member_phone FROM member m WHERE m.member_id = #{sId}), #{payment_value}, date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S') )
mapper.select: SELECT payment_idx, member_id, member_phone, payment_value, payment_date FROM payment WHERE member_id = #{sId} ORDER BY payment_idx DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coin VALUES (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(CAST(c.coin_idx as unsigned)), 0) + 1 FROM coin c), #{sId}, #{payment_value}, '', (#{payment_value} + #{balance}), date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'))
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(coupon_idx) FROM coupon WHERE member_id = #{sId} AND coupon_status ='N'
SELECT coupon_idx, coupon_title, coupon_content, coupon_price FROM coupon WHERE member_id = #{sId} AND coupon_status ='N'

SELECT it.item_idx, im.img_name, it.item_title, it.item_region, it.item_price, it.item_date FROM item it LEFT OUTER JOIN img im ON it.item_idx = im.item_idx, ord o WHERE o.member_id = #{sId} AND o.ord_status = 'N' AND it.item_idx = o.item_idx AND im.item_idx = it.item_idx AND im.img_idx = '1'
SELECT COUNT(it.item_idx) FROM item it, ord o WHERE 1=1 AND it.item_idx = o.item_idx AND o.member_id = #{sId} AND o.ord_status = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(w.item_idx) FROM wish w WHERE w.member_id = #{sId}

SELECT it.item_idx, im.img_name, it.item_title, it.item_region, it.item_price, it.item_date FROM item it LEFT OUTER JOIN img im ON it.item_idx = im.item_idx, wish w WHERE 1=1 AND w.member_id = #{sId} AND it.item_idx = w.item_idx AND im.item_idx = it.item_idx AND im.img_idx = '1'

SELECT it.item_idx, im.img_name, s.shop_name ,it.item_title, it.item_content ,it.item_price, o.ord_quantity ,o.ord_date FROM item it LEFT OUTER JOIN img im ON it.item_idx = im.item_idx, ord o, shop s WHERE o.ord_status = 'Y' AND o.member_id = #{sId} AND it.item_idx = o.item_idx AND im.item_idx = it.item_idx AND im.img_idx = '1' AND s.shop_idx = it.shop_idx

SELECT it.item_idx, im.img_name, s.shop_name ,it.item_title, it.item_content ,it.item_price, o.ord_quantity ,o.ord_date FROM item it LEFT OUTER JOIN img im ON it.item_idx = im.item_idx, ord o, shop s WHERE 1=1 AND o.ord_status = 'C' AND o.member_id = #{sId} AND it.item_idx = o.item_idx AND im.item_idx = it.item_idx AND im.img_idx = '1' AND s.shop_idx = it.shop_idx

SELECT o.item_idx, s.shop_name, i.item_title, i.item_price, im.img_name, o.ord_date, o.ord_status, o.ord_reqContent, o.ord_quantity, r.review_idx FROM ord o JOIN item i ON o.item_idx = i.item_idx JOIN img im ON im.item_idx = o.item_idx JOIN shop s ON i.shop_idx = s.shop_idx LEFT JOIN review r ON o.ord_idx = r.ord_idx WHERE o.member_id = #{sId} AND im.img_idx='1' LIMIT #{pageInfo.startRow}, #{pageInfo.listLimit}
SELECT it.item_idx, it.item_title, it.item_quantity, im.img_name FROM item it LEFT OUTER JOIN img im ON it.item_idx = im.item_idx WHERE 1=1 AND it.item_idx = #{item_idx} AND im.img_idx = '1'
SELECT coin_total FROM coin WHERE coin_date = (SELECT * FROM (SELECT max(coin_date) FROM coin WHERE member_id=#{shop_member_id}) AS a)
SELECT s.member_id FROM item i, shop s WHERE i.shop_idx = s.shop_idx AND i.item_idx = #{item_idx}

SELECT i.item_title, o.ord_quantity, s.shop_name, o.ord_date, r.review_content, r.review_score, r.review_date FROM item i, ord o, shop s, review r WHERE i.item_idx=o.item_idx AND s.shop_idx=i.shop_idx AND r.item_idx=i.item_idx AND o.ord_idx=r.ord_idx AND ord_status='Y' AND o.member_id=#{sId}
